channel.description: The latest CVEs for MediaTek, Inc. -- MT6879, MT6893, MT6895, MT6985, MT8795T, MT8798

item.title: CVE-2022-32603|2024-08-03T07:46:44.636Z -- mediatek%2C%20inc. -- mt6879%2C%20mt6893%2C%20mt6895%2C%20mt6985%2C%20mt8795t%2C%20mt8798
item.description: In gpu drm, there is a possible out of bounds write due to improper input validation. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Patch ID: ALPS07310704; Issue ID: ALPS07310704.
